Compatible with iOS 11

This tweak is an add-on that lives above the lockscreen. It provides an OLED-friendly interface to quickly glance at the time, see your battery status, and see the number of notifications you have. Simply tap the screen to dismiss it. Also includes charge animation. Tested on iPhone X 11.1.2. Compatible with FastUnlockX!

Thanks to Julio Verne's ChargeMode for inspiration!

Configure options from Settings.

- fixed a small lag on the clock when waking up the phone


- added support for 24 hour time
- fixed issue where hour label would take up two lines
- fixed cases where AM/PM label would disappear
